Title: Ties That Bind
Plot: As the god of war, Ares, schemes to make Xena lead his army, the warrior princess meets a man claiming to be her long-lost father.
GuestStars: Tom Atkins, Stephen Lovatt, Sonia Gray, Lutz Halbhubner, Jonathan Whittaker, Heidi Anderson, Robin Kora, Mark Perry, Tony Williams, James Marcum
